# buildBlock()

**Type Method**

Creates an empty map content block that contains no statements.

## Declaration

```swift
static func buildBlock() -> EmptyMapContent
```

## Return Value

Returns [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/EmptyMapContent].

## Map content builders

- **buildBlock(_:)**: Creates a map content block that contains a single content result.
